title: Hail of Blades Mord good in blind pick?
body:
I would think this is super broken. Build nashor's tooth and you can output your Q attacks with 1.75 or 2.00 attack speed.

Thoughts?

replies.body: I'm trying to figure out what being in blind pick has to do with how good this would be.
Bruh. Anything is good in blind pick
assuming you can get within auto range
